recentPerformance.last5Games: Oettinger playing best hockey of career
recentPerformance.cushion: Plus money on elite team playing excellent hockey

keyFactors.title: Road Point Streak
keyFactors.description: Stars riding 8-game road point streak - elite road team

keyFactors.title: Robertson Hot Streak
keyFactors.description: Jason Robertson on 6-game goal streak - longest since franchise moved to Dallas

keyFactors.title: Plus Money Value
keyFactors.description: Getting +118 on Stars playing this well is rare value

riskFactors: Connor McDavid can take over any game

teamStats.skinnerPulled: 4 goals on 8 shots before being pulled

benn.note: 400th career NHL goal - opened scoring 4 mins in. 2nd in franchise history after Modano (557)

robertson.note: Extended goal streak to 7 games (11 goals) - longest since franchise relocated to Dallas in 1993

bastian.note: Depth scoring came through big time

skinner.note: Pulled after allowing 4 goals on just 8 shots - disaster for Edmonton

quarterBreakdown.description: Stars struck early and often. Multiple goals established control.
Dallas continued onslaught. Benn scored 400th career goal. Oilers had no answer.
Stars poured it on. 8 goals total - complete domination on the road.

gameResults.whenCleared: Game was effectively over after first period - Stars dominated from puck drop
gameResults.gamePace: Stars controlled tempo throughout - Oilers never found rhythm
gameResults.turningPoint: Fast start from Dallas - Oilers were chasing all game

whatWentRight.title: Historic Night
whatWentRight.description: Jamie Benn's 400th goal - milestone moment in franchise history

whatWentRight.title: Robertson Streak Extended
whatWentRight.description: 7-game goal streak now longest since franchise moved to Dallas

whatWentRight.title: Depth Scoring
whatWentRight.description: Bastian with 2 goals, Johnston with 4 points - everyone contributed

whatWentRight.title: Oettinger Solid
whatWentRight.description: 22 saves, kept Oilers from making any run

statisticalContext.vsSeasonAverage: 8 goals vs 3.5 average - more than double

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: This exceeded all expectations. 8-3 road win at Edmonton is an outlier performance. Plus money on an elite road team was the right call, but 8 goals was a bonus.

closingLineValue.verdict: Strong positive CLV - got +118 when line closed at +110. Market moved toward Stars as expected.

keyTakeaways: Plus money on elite road teams is always value
Jamie Benn 400th goal - historic franchise moment
Stars road point streak extended to 9 games (6-0-3)
Sometimes you get plus money and win 8-3 - variance goes both ways
verdict: Perfect execution. Plus money on elite team playing excellent hockey - this is the formula. Stars validated thesis with historic performance.
